org.andengine.opengl.texture

Class TextureOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.andengine.opengl.texture.TextureOptions

  • public class TextureOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The TextureOptions defines with what parameters a ITexture is treated with by the hardware. The MinFilter and MagFilter are responsible for the resulting render-quality. I.e. GLES20#GL_NEAREST will look more pixelated than GLES20#GL_LINEAR, but will render a bit faster. WrapT and WrapS define how TextureCoordinates that exceed the [0,1] limit are treated. I.e. GLES20#GL_REPEAT will repeat the ITexture and GLES20#GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE will stretch the outermost pixels of the ITexture. (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
    Since:
    13:00:09 - 05.04.2010
    Author:
    Nicolas Gramlich
